content: Given the volume increase you're seeing running through that business, maybe can you parse out -- you mentioned the input cost pressure, $1.5 million, that would get you a little bit higher on an incremental basis, if we were to exclude that. And since -- to build on what Patrick's saying, since Industrial margins are very much in focus, I would also add that, remember, $12.4 million of the sales increase was driven by FX in quarter, which has virtually no margin drop-through associated with it.
